oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Program of the Nashville City Schools Home Economics Workshop hosted at Howard School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1948 October 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program flyer of the Nashville City Schools Home Economics Workshop hosted at Howard School on October 30th, 1948. Forms part of the John Lawrence Connelly Collection, 1 program.
